tool_description: Predicts noise levels and impact zones from mining equipment and operations using acoustic modeling.

equipment_list.description: List of noise-generating equipment (excavators, trucks, crushers, etc.)

equipment_counts.description: Number of each equipment type (must match equipment_list length)

terrain_type.description: Terrain type affecting sound propagation (flat, hilly, mountainous)

error_messages: Equipment mismatch: Equipment list and counts arrays must have the same length.
Invalid operating hours: Operating hours must be between 1-24.
Empty equipment list: At least one piece of equipment must be specified.
Invalid equipment counts: All counts must be positive integers.
Invalid terrain type: Use flat, hilly, or mountainous.
usage: Specify equipment types, quantities, and operating parameters to predict noise levels and identify areas requiring mitigation.

max_noise_level.description: Maximum predicted noise level in dB(A)

noise_contours.description: Noise level contour descriptions (distance and dB level)

residential_impact_distance.description: Distance to nearest residential areas exceeding noise limits in meters

wildlife_impact_zones.description: Areas where noise may impact wildlife

mitigation_required.description: Whether noise mitigation measures are required
